## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the workflow it would improve.

**Example:**
> I want to run multiple models simultaneously so that I can combine detection and segmentation results.

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

**Example:**
> Add a `--secondary-model` flag to run a second model on the same input frame and publish results to a separate topic.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?
